optixPerformance.name: optixPerformance

revisions.description: The initial revision of this MIB module.

optixPerformance.contactinfo: R&D Building Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. Bantian, Longgang District Shenzhen, P. R. China http://www.huawei.com Zip:518129 E-mail:support@huawei.com
optixPerformance.description: This module MIB describes the Optix Perfomance.

per15mMonitorStartTime.name: per15mMonitorStartTime
per15mMonitorStartTime.description: Start date and time of 15 minutes PM period.When system enter the per15mMonitorStartTime,15 minutes PM starts.the per15mMonitorStartTime should not ealier than current date and time, specially,when it is equal to 1990-00-00 00:00:00,15 minutes PM starts immediately.reset the per15mMonitorStartTime will terminate current 15 minutes PM period.When system enter the per15mMonitorEndTime, the per15mMonitorStartTime will be reset to zero.

per15mMonitorEndTime.name: per15mMonitorEndTime
per15mMonitorEndTime.description: End date and time of 15 minutes PM period.you need set the per15mMonitorStartTime before set the per15mMonitorEndTime,and per15mMonitorStartTime should earlier than the per15mMonitorEndTime,specially,when the per15mMonitorEndTime is equal to 1990-00-00 00:00:00,15 minutes PM ends immediately. When system enter the per15mMonitorEndTime,the per15mMonitorEndTime will be reset to zero.

per24hMonitorStartTime.name: per24hMonitorStartTime
per24hMonitorStartTime.description: Start date and time of one day PM period.When system enter the per24hMonitorStartTime,one day PM starts.the per24hMonitorStartTime should not ealier than current date and time, specially,when it is equal to 1990-00-00 00:00:00,one day PM starts immediately.reset the per24hMonitorStartTime will terminate current one day PM period.When system enter the per24hMonitorEndTime, the per24hMonitorStartTime will be reset to zero.

per24hMonitorEndTime.name: per24hMonitorEndTime
per24hMonitorEndTime.description: End date and time of one day PM period.you need set the per24hMonitorStartTime before set the per24hMonitorEndTime,and per24hMonitorStartTime should earlier than the per24hMonitorEndTime,specially,when the per24hMonitorEndTime is equal to 1990-00-00 00:00:00,one day PM ends immediately. When system enter the per24hMonitorEndTime,the per24hMonitorEndTime will be reset to zero.

per15mCurrentDataEventID.description: Event ID:values depend on type of card

per15mCurrentDataStartTime.name: per15mCurrentDataStartTime
per15mCurrentDataStartTime.description: start date and time: start date and time of current 15 minutes PM period.

per15mCurrentDataValue.name: per15mCurrentDataValue
per15mCurrentDataValue.description: Current data value: value of current 15 minutes PM period register.the units of value vary as the PM event,fo example,the unit of RSUAS is 'second',while the unit of RSBBE is 'count'.

per15mCurrentDataReset.name: per15mCurrentDataReset
per15mCurrentDataReset.description: Current data reset: reset value of current 15 minutes PM period register to zero.

per15mThresholdEventID.description: Event ID:values depend on type of card

per15mThresholdHighValue.name: per15mThresholdHighValue
per15mThresholdHighValue.description: High threshold value: some parameters have two thresholds,such as RSBBE, while others have single threshold,such as RSSES.

per15mThresholdLowValue.name: per15mThresholdLowValue
per15mThresholdLowValue.description: Low threshold value: specially,some parameters have single threshold, so their Low threshold should always be zero.

per15mThresholdReset.name: per15mThresholdReset
per15mThresholdReset.description: Threshold reset: reset both high threshold and low threshold(if has).

per15mMonitorStatus.name: per15mMonitorStatus
per15mMonitorStatus.description: Monitor status: when monitor status is disabled,current data register is reset to zero and will not increase any more until monitor status be enabled. The default monitor status is enable.

per15mPauseStatus.name: per15mPauseStatus
per15mPauseStatus.description: Pause status: when pause status is disabled,current data register will not increase (but will reset to zero)any more until pause status be enabled.The default monitor status is disable.
